  • gov-db : ongoing

    An open-source government data platform for tracking and mapping govt information including public officials, policies, and responsibilities in Nigeria, from the grassroot to federal level.

  • cluster.community : ongoing

    Cluster.community is a social matching tool / service that utilizes semantic tag-based matching to connect people based on shared interests, values, hobbies, etc. Instead of relying on traditional profiles, users define themselves with structured but flexible tags, categorized into hobbies, interests, values, etc, each with customizable visibility settings.
